TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INestedContainer implements class System.ComponentModel.IContainer, class System.IDisposable
Public Interface INestedContainer Implements IContainer, IDisposable
public interface class INestedContainer : IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::IContainer
type INestedContainer = interface interface IContainer interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供嵌套容器的功能，嵌套容器逻辑上可包含零个或多个其他组件，且这类容器由父组件拥有。

span.span: Provides functionality for nested containers, which logically contain zero or more other components and are owned by a parent component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口添加到一个所属组件的概念接口。The interface adds the concept of an owning component to the interface. 嵌套的容器是在逻辑上，但不是一定是以可视方式，包含零个或多个子组件并由某些父组件拥有的对象。A nested container is an object that logically, but not necessarily visually, contains zero or more child components and is owned by some parent component. 对于 visual 包含所属组件通常是另一个容器。For visual containment, the owning component is often another container. 嵌套的容器允许控件成为可设计的而无需为每个子控件提供一个显式序列化的成员变量或自定义序列化程序的各个部分。Nested containers allow sections of a control to be designable, without requiring an explicit serialized member variable or a custom serializer for each subcontrol. 相反，窗体设计器维护组件的一个主的容器。Instead, the form designer maintains one master container of components. 每个组件的站点可能会提供一个位置来放置额外的组件的嵌套的容器。Each component's site may have a nested container that provides a place to put extra components. 时组件放置在嵌套的容器，它接收的名称是其给定名称和其所属组件的名称的组合。When a component is sited in a nested container, the name it receives is a combination of its given name and its owning component's name. 此外，组件添加到嵌套容器拥有完全访问权限的服务的父容器，并且嵌套的容器提供的相对于添加新组件的父级相同的行为。Additionally, components added to a nested container have full access to the services of the parent container, and the nested container provides the same behavior of the parent with respect to adding new components. 嵌套的容器将创建设计器为每个组件包含，从而使设计时支持。The nested container will create the designer for each component it contains, thereby enabling design-time support. 标准的代码序列化程序看不到嵌套的容器，因为如果它们的路径可以获取主容器中的组件的每个步骤，则仅序列化这些组件。Because standard code serializers do not look at nested containers, these components are only serialized if a path to them can be obtained by walking the components in the primary container. 嵌套的容器可以通过查询类型的服务的组件的站点找到。Nested containers can be found by querying a component's site for services of type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Owner As IComponent
public: property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ Owner { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取嵌套容器的所属组件。

span.span: Gets the owning component for the nested container.
The that owns the nested container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所属组件是区分从普通的容器的嵌套的容器的特征。The owning component is the characteristic that differentiates nested containers from ordinary containers.
